cab.content: this Document is the Property of^ J")is Britannic i^Kpst^s' G )-.,- *v V*t)military Secret. 1315From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,5th March 1920.Priority A.2971. Continuation of our telegram of the 3rd instant, No. 2848. Malleson wires, repeating Tehran, that report of Bolshevik incursion into Daragaz is unfounded. His Agents in Kuchan, Bajgiran and Bujnurd report nothing unusual.
